ConfigEntry.Value: format( "UID_AERole in (select UID_Org from BaseTreeCollection where {0})", sqlcompareuid("uid_parentorg", "RMB-AEROLE-ROLEADMIN-RULERIT"))
format( "UID_AERole in (select UID_Org from BaseTreeCollection where {0})", sqlcompareuid("uid_parentorg", "RMB-AEROLE-ROLEADMIN-RULER"))
format( "UID_AERole in (select UID_Org from BaseTreeCollection where {0})", sqlcompareuid("uid_parentorg", "CPL-AEROLE-RULEADMIN-ATTESTATOR"))

format("UID_OrgType in ( select ht.UID_OrgType from QEROrgRootHasOrgType ht where {0} union select t.UID_OrgType from OrgType t left outer join QEROrgRootHasOrgType h on t.UID_OrgType = h.UID_OrgType and {1} where not exists (select top 1 1 from QEROrgRootHasOrgType ht where {0}) and h.UID_OrgRoot is null)", sqlcompareuid("ht.UID_OrgRoot", uid_orgroot), sqlcompareuid("h.UID_OrgRoot", uid_orgroot, "notequal"))
